A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat prowling the neighborhood. Things go from bad to worse when the cat-toy ends up stabbing them both to death, and spitting out his seed in Alice’s womb. The needle-toothed feline is acted by Glenn Morshower.
With John Schneider, Holly Gagnon, Heidi Kozak
